meanings.definition: Not giving pleasure or satisfaction; disagreeable or offensive.
meanings.sent1: The unpleasing smell of rotten eggs filled the room.
meanings.sent2: The unpleasing color of the walls made the room feel dull.
meanings.sent3: The unpleasing taste of the medicine made the child scrunch up his face.
meanings.sent4: The unpleasing sound of nails on a chalkboard made everyone cringe.
meanings.sent5: The unpleasing sight of garbage scattered around the park ruined the peaceful atmosphere.

meanings.sent1: Her unpleasing performance in the play disappointed the audience.
meanings.sent2: The unpleasing design of the website made it hard to navigate.
meanings.sent3: The unpleasing weather ruined our plans for a picnic.
meanings.sent4: The unpleasing behavior of the guests made the host regret inviting them.
meanings.sent5: The unpleasing outcome of the experiment left the scientists puzzled.
